snippet: President Hugo Chávez is receiving chemotherapy or radiation treatments, a government official said Friday. Mr. Chávez has not been seen in public since his Dec. 11 surgery in Havana.
abstract: Venezuelan officials say Pres Hugo Chavez is receiving chemotherapy or radiation treatments in aftermath of his most recent cancer surgery.
lead_paragraph: President Hugo Chávez is receiving chemotherapy or radiation treatments, a government official said Friday. Mr. Chávez has not been seen in public since his Dec. 11 surgery in Havana.

headline.seo: Venezuelan Official Confirms Chávez Receiving Cancer Treatments
headline.main: Venezuelan Official Confirms Chávez Receiving Cancer Treatments
headline.print_headline:
Chávez Back
On Treatment
For Cancer
